## Public Member Functions

### canLowerReturn() {#a672b2d48b831e2db6310036e4bf711d0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RISCVCallLowering::canLowerReturn (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">CallingConv::ID</a> CallConv, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/basearginfo">BaseArgInfo</a> &gt; &amp; Outs, bool IsVarArg) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to check whether the return values described by <code>Outs</code> can fit into the return registers.

If false is returned, an sret-demotion is performed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-h/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-h">RISCVCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp/#l00434">434</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp">RISCVCallLowering.cpp</a>.

### lowerCall() {#a82f1da052b54c0bd8969fea523e25066}

<MemberDefinition

### lowerFormalArguments() {#a8cc7d29f4f0c77bb62d3f77629678a64}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RISCVCallLowering::lowerFormalArguments (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook must be implemented to lower the incoming (formal) arguments, described by <code>VRegs</code>, for GlobalISel.

Each argument must end up in the related virtual registers described by <code>VRegs</code>. In other words, the first argument should end up in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;0&#93;, the second in <code>VRegs</code>&#91;1&#93;, and so on. For each argument, there will be one register for each non-aggregate type, as returned by <code>computeValueLLTs</code>. <code>MIRBuilder</code> is set to the proper insertion for the argument lowering. <code>FLI</code> is required for sret demotion.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the lowering succeeded, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-h">RISCVCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp/#l00531">531</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp">RISCVCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lowerReturn() {#a2a90be51e47dadfbb04df4f64465ea04}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RISCVCallLowering::lowerReturn (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp; MIRBuilder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt; VRegs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionloweringinfo">FunctionLoweringInfo</a> &amp; FLI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This hook behaves as the extended lowerReturn function, but for targets that do not support swifterror value promotion.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-h/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-h">RISCVCallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp/#l00395">395</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/gisel/riscvcalllowering-cpp">RISCVCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
